ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A short, natural language description of the characteristic that could be used to communicate the criteria to an end-user.

ivardefs.name: exclude
ivardefs.desc: When true, members with this characteristic are excluded from the element.

ivardefs.name: groupMeasure
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how elements are aggregated within the study effective period.

ivardefs.name: timeFromStart
ivardefs.desc: Indicates duration from the participant's study entry.

ivardefs.name: usageContext_
ivardefs.desc: Use UsageContext to define the members of the population, such as Age Ranges, Genders, Settings.

properties.desc: A characteristic that defines the members of the evidence element. Multiple characteristics are applied with "and" semantics.
